job.title: Data Scientist

job.description: ltstronggtltugtthe optimal candidate will be responsible forltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthe naval nuclear laboratory is seeking a data scientist to join a team dedicated to collecting and transforming data from the naval nuclear fleet for analytics throughout the laboratoryltbrgtltulgtltligtpresenting indepth analysis in a clear and concise manner with a dataoriented approach to problem solving and decision makingltligt ltligtbuilding predictive models to characterize various systemsltligt ltligtprocessing refining and verifying the integrity of data used for analysisltligt ltbrgtltulgtthe data scientist will display great collaboration and interpersonal skills both written and verbal through leading improvement projects and providing regular updates to the organization preferred skills includeltbrgtltulgtltligtgood scripting and programming skills experience in python and rltligt ltligtexperience with data visualization packages such as tableau sas and rstudioltligt ltligtunderstanding of machinelearning and its applicationsltligt ltligtproficiency in working with databasesltligtltulgt
